markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stormsoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2593) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 114 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning. You gain resistance to electricity equal to half your level (minimum 1).
name: Stormsoul
